statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, engagement_date FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM user_engagement;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT MAX(engagement_score), MIN(engagement_score) FROM user_engagement;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_time FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_duration > 60 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE creation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_date, engagement_duration FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(engagement_duration) AS total_duration FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_duration > 100;
SELECT username, email, engagement_date FROM users JOIN user_engagement ON users.user_id = user_engagement.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement
SELECT user_id, page_views FROM user_engagement ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT user_id, likes FROM user_engagement WHERE page_views > 10
SELECT user_id, time_stamp FROM user_engagement WHERE likes < 5 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_engagement
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, page_views FROM user_engagement WHERE likes > 10 ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_engagement WHERE page_views < 5 AND likes < 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(page_views) AS avg_page_views FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_events > 3 ORDER BY total_events DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, username, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT title, views_count, likes_count FROM content_performance ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT trend_id, content_id, trend_type, trend_value FROM engagement_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, username, engagement_score FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT content_id, title FROM content_performance ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01' AND interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT content_id, MAX(trend_value) AS max_value FROM engagement_trends GROUP BY content_id;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, time_stamp FROM user_engagement_data;
SELECT content_id, content_type, creation_date FROM content_data WHERE content_type = 'Article' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM user_data WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_data WHERE interaction_type = 'Like' LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_value FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_value > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_data;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM content_data WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM user_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM interaction_data WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%click%';
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, trend_value FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_value > 50 ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
